cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to 0 will cause thread allocation failure and prevent proper PUSCH processing.

du.explanation_en: Setting ofdm_offset_divisor to 0 will cause invalid OFDM configuration and lead to synchronization issues in the physical layer.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ofdm_offset_divisor 設定為 0 會導致無效的 OFDM 配置，並在物理層導致同步問題。
